thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 178
thread.title: Edwin Knox

author: Edwin Knox
title: Edwin Knox
text: We found it easy getting set up with Trusted House Sitters. There was prompt response from the "support team" in answering a few questions we had. This was great. Without much difficulty we had secured a good house sitter for our short time away. All worked out just perfectly. We hope to use this great service again soon in upcoming years and my wife and I hope to get out and house/pet sit too sometime in the near future.
